catalog.dc:comment: This catalog is meant to be used for compiling a data management plan for large consortial projects at DKRZ. It contains questions required for the FAIR aspects of H2020 data management plans.
catalog.title: Data management for Climate Modelling (Beta test mode)
catalog.help: This catalogue is for data management in climate modelling projects. The catalogue was developed by the German Climate Computing Centre in Hamburg.
catalog.title: Datenmanagement für Klimamodellierung (Beta-Testmodus)
catalog.help: Dieser Katalog ist für das Datenmanagement in Klimamodellierungsprojekten gedacht. Der Katalog wurde vom Deutschen Klimarechenzentrum in Hamburg entwickelt.

question.text: What is the project title?
Was ist der Projektname?
What is the project acronym?
Was ist das Projektakronym?

question.help: Enter a comma-separated list of authors.
question.text: Who is responsible for the content of this data management plan?
Wer ist für den Inhalt dieses Datenmanagementplans verantwortlich?
What is the main research question of the project?
Wie lautet die primäre Forschungsfrage des Projektes?
Please give some keywords describing the research question.
Bitte geben Sie einige Schlagworte zur Forschungsfrage an.
What is the purpose of the data creation/collection and its relation to the objectives of the project?
Wie unterstützt die Datengenerierung und -sammlung die Verfolgung der Projektziele?
What types and formats of data will the project generate/collect?
Welche Art von Daten und in welchem Format werden diese im Projekt generiert/gesammelt?
What is the expected size of the generated data?
Was ist das erwartete Volumen der im Projekt generierten Daten?
Will any existing data be re-used and how?
Werden existierende Daten nachgenutzt, und wenn ja, wie?

questionset.dc:comment: for Germany, the classification works, but we might consider also DDC as an option
questionset.title: Research field
Disziplin

question.dc:comment: for Germany, the classification works, but we might consider also DDC as an option
question.help: The list of disciplines follows the subject classification of the DFG (German Research Foundation).
question.text: Which research field(s) does this project belong to?
question.help: Die Liste der Disziplinen entspricht der Fachsystematik der Deutschen Forschungsgemeinschaft (DFG).
question.text: Welcher Disziplin / welchen Disziplinen ist das Projekt zuzuordnen?

question.help: Add coordinator(s) name(s), email address and affiliation(s)
question.text: Who is responsible for the project coordination?
question.help: Bitte nennen Sie Namen, Kontaktdetails und institutionell Zugehörigkeit.
question.text: Wer ist verantwortlich für die Projektkoordination?
When does the project start?
Wann beginnt die Projektlaufzeit?
When does the project end?
Wann endet die Projektlaufzeit?
Project partner
Projektpartner
Institution Address
Anschrift

question.help: Please give the name and an email address.
question.text: Who is/are the main contact person(s) at this partner institution?
question.help: Bitte geben Sie den Namen und eine Email Adresse an.
question.text: Wer ist/sind bei diesem Partner der/die Hauptansprechpartner/in für das Projekt?
Who is funding the project?
Wer fördert das Projekt?
Is the project within a special funding programme?
In welcher Förderlinie und/oder welchem Förderprogramm wird das Projekt gefördert?
Are there internal project guidelines for a consistent organisation of the data? If so, where are they documented?
Gibt es projektinterne Vereinbarungen zur konsistenten Organisation der Daten? Wenn ja, wo sind diese dokumentiert?
Who could be interested in re-using the data and tools produced in the framework of the project?
Für welche Personen, Gruppen oder Institutionen könnte dieser Datensatz (für die Nachnutzung) von Interesse sein?
To what extent are infrastructure resources required (e.g. CPU hours, bandwidth, storage space... etc.).
In welchem Umfang werden Infrastrukturressourcen benötigt (CPU-Stunden, Bandbreite, Speicherplatz etc.)?

question.help:
How much was requested? Was the request granted?
Please also refer to appropriate documents, e.g. as attached to this DMP.
question.text: If resources have been applied for, please detail the status of the application.
Wenn Ressourcen beantragt wurden, wie ist der Status des Antrages?
Is the data produced in the project reproducible in the sense that it could be created / collected anew in case it got lost?
Sind die in diesem WP erzeugten Datensätze reproduzierbar, d. h. ließen sie sich, wenn sie verloren gingen, erneut erstellen oder erheben?
What provisions are in place to ensure data security?
Welche Maßnahmen zur Wahrung der Datensicherheit werden ergriffen?
Is the data safely stored in certified repositories for long term preservation and curation?
Werden die Daten in einem zertifizierten Langzeitarchiv verwahrt und kuratiert?

questionset.dc:comment: Aspects related to FAIR data as required by the EU H2020 DMP template
questionset.title: FAIR data
FAIR data

question.dc:comment: Content pertaining to the project data to which the FAIR principles will apply and in which form. This is necessary, as it is impossible to save all data produced in Earth System Science.
question.text: Which project data is planned to be made available following the FAIR principles?
Welche Daten aus dem Projekt sollen FAIR verfügbar gemacht werden?

question.dc:comment: Section on making data findable, as required by the EU H2020 DMP template
question.help: Are the data produced and/or used in the project discoverable with metadata, identifiable and locatable by means of a standard identification mechanism (e.g. persistent and unique identifiers such as Digital Object Identifiers)? What naming conventions do you follow? Will search keywords be provided that optimize possibilities for re-use? Do you provide clear version numbers? What metadata will be created? In case metadata standards do not exist in your discipline, please outline what type of metadata will be created and how.
question.text: Making data findable, including provisions for metadata
question.help: Are the data produced and/or used in the project discoverable with metadata, identifiable and locatable by means of a standard identification mechanism (e.g. persistent and unique identifiers such as Digital Object Identifiers)? What naming conventions do you follow? Will search keywords be provided that optimize possibilities for re-use? Do you provide clear version numbers? What metadata will be created? In case metadata standards do not exist in your discipline, please outline what type of metadata will be created and how.
question.text: Making data findable, including provisions for metadata

question.dc:comment: Aspects related to accessibility as required by the EU H2020 DMP template.
question.help: Which data produced and/or used in the project will be made openly available as the default? If certain datasets cannot be shared (or need to be shared under restrictions), explain why, clearly separating legal and contractual reasons from voluntary restrictions. Note that in multi-beneficiary projects it is also possible for specific beneficiaries to keep their data closed if relevant provisions are made in the consortium agreement and are in line with the reasons for opting out. How will the data be made accessible (e.g. by deposition in a repository)? What methods or software tools are needed to access the data? Is documentation about the software needed to access the data included? Is it possible to include the relevant software (e.g. in open source code)? Where will the data and associated metadata, documentation and code be deposited? Preference should be given to certified repositories which support open access where possible. Have you explored appropriate arrangements with the identified repository? If there are restrictions on use, how will access be provided? Is there a need for a data access committee? Are there well described conditions for access (i.e. a machine readable license)? How will the identity of the person accessing the data be ascertained?
question.text: Making data accessible
question.help: Which data produced and/or used in the project will be made openly available as the default? If certain datasets cannot be shared (or need to be shared under restrictions), explain why, clearly separating legal and contractual reasons from voluntary restrictions. Note that in multi-beneficiary projects it is also possible for specific beneficiaries to keep their data closed if relevant provisions are made in the consortium agreement and are in line with the reasons for opting out. How will the data be made accessible (e.g. by deposition in a repository)? What methods or software tools are needed to access the data? Is documentation about the software needed to access the data included? Is it possible to include the relevant software (e.g. in open source code)? Where will the data and associated metadata, documentation and code be deposited? Preference should be given to certified repositories which support open access where possible. Have you explored appropriate arrangements with the identified repository? If there are restrictions on use, how will access be provided? Is there a need for a data access committee? Are there well described conditions for access (i.e. a machine readable license)? How will the identity of the person accessing the data be ascertained?
question.text: Making data accessible

question.dc:comment: Aspects related to data interoperability, as required by EU H2020 DMP template.
question.help: Are the data produced in the project interoperable, that is allowing data exchange and re-use between researchers, institutions, organisations, countries, etc. (i.e. adhering to standards for formats, as much as possible compliant with available (open) software applications, and in particular facilitating re-combinations with different datasets from different origins)? What data and metadata vocabularies, standards or methodologies will you follow to make your data interoperable? Will you be using standard vocabularies for all data types present in your data set, to allow inter-disciplinary interoperability? In case it is unavoidable that you use uncommon or generate project specific ontologies or vocabularies, will you provide mappings to more commonly used ontologies?
question.text: Making data interoperable
question.help: Are the data produced in the project interoperable, that is allowing data exchange and re-use between researchers, institutions, organisations, countries, etc. (i.e. adhering to standards for formats, as much as possible compliant with available (open) software applications, and in particular facilitating re-combinations with different datasets from different origins)? What data and metadata vocabularies, standards or methodologies will you follow to make your data interoperable? Will you be using standard vocabularies for all data types present in your data set, to allow inter-disciplinary interoperability? In case it is unavoidable that you use uncommon or generate project specific ontologies or vocabularies, will you provide mappings to more commonly used ontologies?
question.text: Making data interoperable

question.dc:comment: Aspects related to reusability, as required by EU H2020 DMP template.
question.help: How will the data be licensed to permit the widest re-use possible? When will the data be made available for re-use? If an embargo is sought to give time to publish or seek patents, specify why and how long this will apply, bearing in mind that research data should be made available as soon as possible. Are the data produced and/or used in the project useable by third parties, in particular after the end of the project? If the re-use of some data is restricted, explain why. How long is it intended that the data remains re-usable? Are data quality assurance processes described?
question.text: Making data reusable
question.help: How will the data be licensed to permit the widest re-use possible? When will the data be made available for re-use? If an embargo is sought to give time to publish or seek patents, specify why and how long this will apply, bearing in mind that research data should be made available as soon as possible. Are the data produced and/or used in the project useable by third parties, in particular after the end of the project? If the re-use of some data is restricted, explain why. How long is it intended that the data remains re-usable? Are data quality assurance processes described?
question.text: Making data reusable
Required resources for making data FAIR
Benötigte Ressourcen um FAIRe Daten zu erzeugen

questionset.title: Work package description
questionset.help: The following questions collect information on the data that is produced or used in the specific PalMod2 Work Packages (WPs). They also help to estimate the value of the data in terms of potential re-use and long-term preservation. The information regarding the data collected, produced or used in the project is gathered along WPs.
questionset.title: Datensätze
questionset.help: Die nächsten Fragen dienen zur Beschreibung der Datensätze, die im Projekt erzeugt und/oder verwendet werden. Sie helfen zudem, den Wert der Daten hinsichtlich der potentiellen Nachnutzung und einer späteren Archivierung einschätzen zu können. Vor der Erzeugung von Daten empfiehlt es sich zu prüfen, ob bereits vorhandene Daten nachgenutzt werden können. Die Vermeidung doppelter Erhebungen spart Aufwand und Kosten. Handelt es sich um personenbezogene Daten, ist dies zudem durch den Grundsatz der Erforderlichkeit (BDSG) sowie das Prinzip der Datenvermeidung und Datensparsamkeit (§3a BDSG) geboten. Die Angaben zu den im Projekt erzeugten oder verwendeten Daten sind nach „Datensätzen“ strukturiert. Die Definition dessen, was jeweils ein Datensatz ist, ist eine wichtige konzeptionelle Entscheidung, die für jedes Vorhaben bzw. Projekt individuell getroffen und sorgfältig abgewogen werden muss.

question.text: What are the goals of this WP within the project?
Um was für einen Datensatz handelt es sich?

question.help: Add multiple contact names, if applicable.
question.text: Who is responsible for the data created in this WP during the project?
question.help: Fügen sie ggf. mehrere Kontaktnamen hinzu.
question.text: Wer ist während der Projektlaufzeit für die in diesem WP produzierten Daten verantwortlich?

question.help: Add only one contact name. Note that this responsibility is very long-term and should be assigned to permanent staff members/faculty.
question.text: Who is responsible for the data created in this WP after the project?
question.help: Fügen sie nur einen Kontaktnamen hinzu. Diese Verantworlichkeit ist sehr langfristig angelegt und sollte Personen mit einem unbefristeten Arbeitsverhältnis an der jeweiligen Institution zugewiesen werden.
question.text: Wer ist nach Ablauf der Projektlaufzeit für die in diesem WP produzierten Daten verantwortlich?

question.help: Click any that apply, specify shortly (type of experiment, type of proxy data, which kind of tool).
question.text: What kind of data is produced in this WP?
question.help: Fügen Sie ggf. mehrere Datensätze hinzu.
question.text: Welche Art von Daten wird in diesem WP erzeugt?

question.help: Add multiple datasets if applicable. Refer to other documents if possible, e.g. online documentation of project data or project proposal
question.text: Please specify the dataset(s) produced in this WP
Bitte spezifizieren Sie die in diesem WP produzierten Daten

question.help: Add multiple sets of variables if applicable.
question.text: Which variables/parameters are the datasets produced in this WP focused on?
question.help: Fügen sie mehrere Datensätze hinzu (falls nötig).
question.text: Welche Variable/Parameter sind den in diesem WP enthaltenen Datensätzen enthalten?
Does work in this WP depend on input data from other WP's?
Werden zur Arbeit in diesem WP Datensätze anderer WP's benötigt?
If yes, data from which WP and what kind of data is needed?
Wenn ja, von welchem WP und welche Art von Daten werden benötigt?

question.help: Include one date for every dataset mentioned above
question.text: When is the data from other WP's required (in project months)?
question.help: Geben sie einen Zeitpunkt pro Datensatz und WP an.
question.text: Wann werden die Daten benötigt (in Projektmonaten)?
Does work in this WP depend on data from project-external sources?
Werden für die Arbeit in diesem WP Daten aus PalMod-externen Quellen benötigt?

question.help: Please add multiple datasets and sources if necessary.
question.text: If yes, which external datasets are needed?
question.help: Fügen Sie ggf. mehrere Datensätze hinzu.
question.text: Falls ja, welche externe Datensätze werden benötigt?
What is the actual or expected size of the data produced/collected in this WP?
Was ist die tatsächliche oder erwartete Größe der in diesem WP produzierten/gesammelten Daten?

question.help: Check any that apply.
question.text: Which measures will be taken to reduce storage load on shared disk resources during the project?
question.help: Mehrfachauswahl möglich
question.text: Welche Maßnahmen werden unternommen, um die Speicherauslastung auf Festplatten während der Projektlaufzeit zu reduzieren?

questionset.title: Data storage and security
questionset.help: This question refers to backups while the data is being worked with. Questions of long-term preservation will be adressed in the respective section.
questionset.title: Datenspeicherung und -sicherheit
questionset.help: Die Frage bezieht sich auf Backups während der Zeit, in denen mit den Daten gearbeitet wird. Fragen der Langzeitarchivierung werden gesondert im entsprechenden Abschnitt behandelt.

question.text: Will regular backups of the data produced in this WP be performed?
Werden regelmäßige Backups der in diesem WP produzierten Daten erstellt?
If no, please explain why
Falls nicht, warum nicht?
If yes, who is responsible for the backups?
Falls ja, wer ist verantwortlich für die Erstellung der Backups?

questionset.title: Project internal data use
questionset.help: The following questions will help to estimate, which ressources are necessary to enable the envisioned data usage scenarios during the project. These can be technical / IT resources as well as expertise brought in by e.g. data managment or IT experts.
questionset.title: Projektinterne Datennutzung
questionset.help: Die folgenden Fragen dienen dazu einzuschätzen, welche Ressourcen für die geplante Nutzung der Daten während der Projektlaufzeit nötig sind. Dabei kann es sich um technische bzw. IT-Ressourcen handeln, aber auch um Expertise, die z.B. durch Datenmanagement- oder IT-ExpertInnen eingebracht wird.

question.text: How / for what purpose will data from this WP be used during the project? Which WP's depend on data produced in this WP?
Wozu / wie werden die in diesem WP produzierten Daten während des Projektes genutzt? Welche WP's benötigen Daten aus diesem WP?

question.help: Include information on i) Where is data stored for analysis during the project? ii) How is collaborative access for project partners managed, if needed?
question.text: How is internal collaboration based on the data produced in this WP organised?
Wie ist die PalMod-interne Zusammenarbeit mit Hilfe der in diesem WP produzierten Daten organisiert?
Will the data produced in this WP be published or shared?
Soll dieser Datensatz veröffentlicht oder geteilt werden?
If no, please explain why not. Please differentiate between legal and contractual reasons and voluntary restrictions.
Wenn nicht, begründen Sie dies bitte und unterscheiden Sie dabei zwischen rechtlichen und/oder vertraglichen Gründen und freiwilligen Einschränkungen.

question.help: The method of publication refers to the infrastructure which will be used to share data with parties ranging from external partners to the global scientific community. Examples could be "ESGF", "WDCC", "PANGAEA", "some specific cloud service", "FTP server at institution XY (including access protocol)". Add multiple methods if applicable to the data produced in this WP.
question.text: If yes, how will the data produced in this WP be published?
Wenn ja, wie werden die in diesem WP produzierten Daten veröffentlicht?

question.help: Include specific information w.r.t. relative time lines, e.g. "after publication of paper"
question.text: When will the data be published (if they are)?
Wann werden die Daten veröffentlicht?
Which standards are applied to ensure reusability of the data?
Welche Standards werden angewandt um die Nachnutzbarkeit der Daten zu gewährleisten?
Who is responsible for documenting the metadata and context information and for checking if they are correct and complete?
Wer ist verantwortlich für die Dokumentation und Prüfung der Metadaten und Kontextinformationen auf Richtigkeit und Vollständigkeit?
Which part/subset of the data produced in this WP will be archived (after the end of the project)?
Auf Basis welcher Kriterien / Regeln werden die Daten zur Archivierung (nach Projektende) ausgesucht?
Who is scientifically responsible for selecting the data to be archived?
Durch wen erfolgt die Auswahl?
Where will the data (including metadata, documentation and, if applicable, relevant code) be stored or archived after the end of the project?
Wo werden die Daten (einschließlich Metadaten, Dokumentation und ggf. relevantem Code bzw. relevanter Software) nach Projektende gespeichert bzw. archiviert?
Who is responsible for archiving the data produced in this WP?
Wer ist verantwortlich für die in diesem WP produzierten Daten?
